english.verse1: Oh God, You are my God. Oh God, You are my God. And I will ever praise You.
english.verse2: I will seek You in the morning. And I will learn to walk in Your ways. And Step by step You'll lead me. And I will follow You all of my days.

chord.verse1: G D C D G G D C D G
chord.verse2: Em D C Am G D C D G
